title: Reminder that the MSI Icon costs 1 IP
body:
This is basically free, and buying it will contribute towards the MSI 2017 Fandom Contest for OCE! :D

> The region with the highest percentage of players equipping their MSI 2017 icon and playing games will dominate the leaderboard and unlock rewards for all players participating. 
  
Details are here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/msi-2017-hits-rift

EDIT: It also looks like we'll need to play games while wearing the icon to earn points.

replies.body:
That's 1 IP I'll never get back...

Not worth it.
Thanks for the heads up, will be interesting to see how OCE does in this! I hope we win >:)

"This is basically free"?? Not everyone is rich enough to afford that you know, you privileged swine.


............

jk, thanks for letting us know.
